\nFLOTER Cargo Cab Service is a technology based approach in logistic sector that helps in making intra-city pickup and deliveries with more transparency and reliability. We FLOTER help the customer to find their Cargo Cab more easily without any hassle. We aims at keeping the market organised. We have a varied category of vehicles an our platform starting from Piaggio three wheeler, Tata ace, Tata super ace, Ashok Leyland dost to Bolero pick up across ODISHA.

OUR SOLUTIONS
 
Real time tracking Customers neednâ€™t require to keep calling the driver to know his location, especially for quick deliveries. Track the vehicle using our tracking option in the app and be tension free.

Transparent Pricing :
 
 Due to un-organisation in the market, there is no fixed price as it is largely due to freak of the driver. So we allow you enjoy economical and transparent pricing. Trust on us to help you ensure consistent, seamless consumer experiences at the lowest cost.".

Verified Drivers Assigned :
 
 We select our drivers through comprehensive process and through background check. Our drivers will provide you better service and will help you in anyway possible.".

Management System :
 
 We aims at serving you best management system which includes tools for Live tracking , Periodic SMS/email alerts, payment history , total trips , point to point billing and Client specific customization.".
